description:
After being awarded the blessings of Arcadia, will it be Harlock or Mr. Zone who carves the future of the universe?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hahanaru Hoshi Chikyuu e!! Uchuu no Yuusha yo Towa ni...
Return to the Mother World Earth: Be Eternal, Cosmic Hero
母なる星 地球へ!! 宇宙の勇者よ永遠[とわ]に...
